Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Here's a 50-word summary paragraph of the news articles you provided:

Title: People are closely following the upcoming federal budget that is expected to provide much-needed relief to struggling industries. While the government plans to invest billions of dollars in missiles and military defence Labor MPs are urging them to increase the JobSeeker payment. Additionally concerns have been raised about wealthy Australians benefitting more from tax breaks compared to the rest of the population. At the same time there are calls for more support for battling food accommodation and retail businesses.
